newsitem.title: USA: Uruguay buys 188,700 bbls gas oil for early Sept.
newsitem.headline: Uruguay buys 188,700 bbls gas oil for early Sept.

text.p: Uruguay's state oil company ANCAP bought 30,000 cubic meters (188,700 bbls) of gas oil from Argentina's YPF in its latest product tender, a trade source said on Friday.
The gas oil is scheduled to be delivered in early September.
ANCAP paid around five cents a gallon above the Gulf Coast price on a cost and freight basis, the source said.
The company received a total of eight offers to supply the gas oil.
Separately, ANCAP issued a tender on Friday to buy one million barrels of crude oil for October 1-10 arrival.
